quest_desc.qdesc: 위대한 용사가 되기 위해서는 멋진 라이벌이 있어야 한다면서 자신의 숙명의 라이벌 타이푼 킴과 자신의 승부에 대해서 자랑. 결론은 너도 라이벌을 잘 관리하라.

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Master Warrior Chandler$
You were just a newbie when you first came to Calderock Village. But look at you now... you are a respectable adventurer who receives challenges from a rival on a regular basis.

$Master Warrior Chandler$
Hahaha! Don’t be shy!!
(Chandler pets your head with his big hands.)

$Master Warrior Chandler$
Don’t be shy!
Everyone needs a rival!
Having a rival is a must in being a hero.

$Master Warrior Chandler$
The path of a hero is a hard and a lonely one.
Often times, even your allies won't able to soothe the loneliness and the pain.
However the only person setting on the same path as you is... your rival

$Master Warrior Chandler$
Only your rival can understand that pain. Sometimes you feel closer to your rival than your family members and even your lover. I still remember when I met my destined rival.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> I'm busy right now, I do not have time for your old stories </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Warrior Chandler$
About couple decades ago... it was when countless monsters swarmed into Calderock Village. In their frontline was this incredibly huge Orc.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Chandler grabs your shoulders with his monstrous hands and continues on with the story.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Warrior Chandler$
Just listen. All this will be your flesh and blood.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Sounds like some proposal to the Orc.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Warrior Chandler$
Everyone around me was afraid of that Orc. But not me... my heart started beating faster, my nostrils got bigger, and my breathing became harder. And I couldn't say a word because I was salivating so much.

$Master Warrior Chandler$
Propose! It was exactly like that. It was as if... I met my soulmate. I knew at that moment that the Orc was to become my destined rival.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Somehow the story seems to get increasingly dangerous.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Warrior Chandler$
It was as if that Orc recognized me also. That Orc... he charged towards me, with his face blushing in deep blue. I can never forget the feeling of his breath brushes against my cheeks.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Just skip everything and go directly to the end.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Warrior Chandler$
Ha, what a kid. You will soon experience such... thrill.
(Don't really want to experience that...)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Orc Gim... that's quite the name for an Orc.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Warrior Chandler$
I kept encountering that Orc from that day on. Along the way, I learned that his name was Orc Gim.

$Master Warrior Chandler$
Thanks to those battles with Orc Gim, I was able to further hone my skills. But starting one day, I stopped seeing Orc Gim in battles.

$Master Warrior Chandler$
There's no way that my fated rival, Orc Gim, fell by the hands of another!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Like I was saying, this story is getting too dangerous...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Warrior Chandler$
I felt lonely in a battle without Orc Gim. I realized what a significant part that Orc Gim held in my life.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Whew, I sure there is nothing like that. </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Warrior Chandler$
That's what a rival is. A true god-given opponent who is meant to bring you up to a higher state. A nonidentical twin bound by soul. Anyways, congratulations for finally having such a figure.

$Master Warrior Chandler$
Ha, I guess you were impressed by my story.
No need to thank me.

$Master Warrior Chandler$
I guess you were so impress that you are speechless. Hahaha!
Remember the words I said today!
(It appears that you've gotten closer with Master Warrior Chandler.)

journal.title: Talk to Master Warrior Chandler
journal.contents:
Go listen to Master Warrior Chandler talk about his rival, Orc Gim.

Calderock Village → Master Warrior Chandler
